items.title: 2025 Notre Dame Football: Irish VS Arkansas Razorbacks
items.summary: It’s playoff football for Notre Dame from now until they lose. It actually started last week against Purdue, but the trick to these things is to do it one game at a time – one play at a time. The next challenge for the Irish is on the road against the Arkansas Razorbacks. Arkansas is […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football: Weather Report for Irish VS Arkansas Razorbacks
items.summary: The Notre Dame Fighting Irish travel to SEC country to take on the Arkansas Razorbacks. Back in August, there were a lot of us that thought this could very well be a ranked matchup and a game that might possibly be worthy of a visit from ESPN’s College Gameday. Instead, the Irish are just 1-2 […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football: Marcus Freeman is REBORN as an Italian-American
items.summary: Marcus Freeman took the podium on Monday as the Irish prepare to head south to take on the Arkansas Razorbacks.The Irish are coming off of a 56-30 win over Purdue, and the Razorbacks just lost their second game in a row — this time to the Memphis Tigers, 32-31. There are, of course, many different […]

items.title: 2025 Notre Dame Football Schedule, TV Times, Stat Leaders, Roster, and Results
items.summary: The Notre Dame football season is up and running — and we’re already putting holes in walls. Despite the loss in Miami, and against Texas A&M, the Irish still have a chance to bring home its 23rd national championship. The gang here at OFD is still pretty pumped to give you the best overall coverage […]

items.title: OPENING ODDS: Notre Dame is a road favorite over the Arkansas Razorbacks
items.summary: The Notre Dame Fighting Irish and Arkansas Razorbacks had two very different college football Saturdays. The Irish got their first win of the season in a 56-30 blowout of the Purdue Boilermakers, and Arkansas lost their second straight game to drop to 2-2 overall (a late game collapse that allowed the Memphis Tigers to take […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football Stats: 2025-26 Week 4 Review
items.summary: Notre Dame football notched its first win of the 2025-26 season and is now 1-2 at the end of Week 4. The Irish beat the Purdue Boilermakers 56-30 in South Bend and I’d argue that the fan base’s stress levels can tone down. Just a bit. Let’s see how/why the stats support that. Scoring Context […]

items.title: Three Things We Saw In Notre Dame’s Win Over Purdue
items.summary: Another year, another vengeful slaughter of the poor Purdue Boilermakers in the aftermath of a painful loss for Notre Dame (in this case, two losses). It says more about the state of Purdue football than Notre Dame, but it is still amusing as someone who grew up with this being an often competitive annual matchup […]
